Payload.SurveyTitle: Online Survey Software | Qualtrics Survey Solutions
Payload.SurveyMetaDescription: The most powerful, simple and trusted way to gather experience data. Start your journey to experience management and try a free account today.

SurveyElements.SecondaryAttribute: How natural are the following speech recordings? Reference: Play Pause

How natural are the following speech recordings?

0.Description: If <html> <body> <audio id="0" src="http://groups.inf.ed.ac.uk/cstr3/cvbotinh/SM/RQ4/SystemComparison/test1/wavs/1book/CB-EM-02-53.wav"></audio> <div> <button onclick="document.getElementById('0').play()">Play</button> <button onclick="document.getElementById('0').pause()">Pause</button> </div> </body> </html> Is Equal to 100

SurveyElements.SecondaryAttribute: Listen carefully to all speech recordings below in full. Then rate how similar the accent of the...

Payload.QuestionText:
Listen carefully to all speech recordings below in full. Then rate how similar the accent of the candidate speech recording is to the reference speech recording on a scale of 1 (completely different accent) to 5 (identical accent). Please disregard the mismatch in voice, gender, and audio quality.
Here is the reference speech recording:
Here is the candidate speech recording to rate:
Payload.QuestionDescription: Listen carefully to all speech recordings below in full. Then rate how similar the accent of the...

1.Display: 1 - They definitely have different accents, with many noticeable differences.

2.Display: 2 - They most likely have different accents, with some noticeable differences.

3.Display: 3 - They may or may not have the same accent, with many subtle differences.

4.Display: 4 - They most likely have the same accent, with some subtle differences.

5.Display: 5 - They definitely have the same accent, with no noticeable differences.

SurveyElements.SecondaryAttribute: Listen carefully to all speech recordings below in full. Then rate how much more or less similar...

Payload.QuestionText:
Listen carefully to all speech recordings below in full. Then rate how much more or less similar recording A is in terms of accent to the reference speech recording, compared to recording B. A score of +2 indicates that recording A is much more similar to the reference than recording B is, whereas -2 indicates that recording B is more similar to the reference. Please disregard the mismatch in voice, gender, and audio quality.
Here is reference speech recording:
Here is speech recording A:
Here is speech recording B:
Payload.QuestionDescription: Listen carefully to all speech recordings below in full. Then rate how much more or less similar...

3.Display: A and B are Equally Similar

Payload.QuestionText:
Listen carefully to all speech recordings below in full. Then rank the candidate speech recordings based on their similarity to the reference speech recording in terms of accent. Please disregard the mismatch in voice, gender, and audio quality.
Here is the reference speech recording:
Here are the candidate speech recordings to be ranked.
